attributes.action: Put Pedophiles in prison for a far longer sentence.
attributes.additional_details: I hate too think this could happen to my family.
attributes.background: Pedophiles get let off too easy they are the absolute scum of the earth, but yet they are protected in prison and dont get the same sort of sentence that for example a drug dealer or murder would get. Ask your self why is this all these things ruin lives why are we letting Pedophiles off easy.
